21  package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util;
22  
23  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
24  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
25  import org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration;
26  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.SmallTests;
27  import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.Compression;
28  import org.apache.hadoop.io.DataOutputBuffer;
29  import org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionCodec;
30  import org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionOutputStream;
31  import org.apache.hadoop.util.NativeCodeLoader;
32  import org.apache.hadoop.util.ReflectionUtils;
33  import org.junit.Test;
34  import org.junit.experimental.categories.Category;
35  
36  import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
37  import java.io.DataOutputStream;
38  import java.io.IOException;
39  
40  import static org.junit.Assert.*;
41  
42  @Category(SmallTests.class)
43  public class TestCompressionTest {
44    static final Log LOG = LogFactory.getLog(TestCompressionTest.class);
45  
46    @Test
47    public void testTestCompression() {
48      // This test will fail if you run the tests with LZO compression available.
49      try {
50        CompressionTest.testCompression(Compression.Algorithm.LZO);
51        fail(); // always throws
52      } catch (IOException e) {
53        // there should be a 'cause'.
54        assertNotNull(e.getCause());
55      }
56  
57      // this is testing the caching of the test results.
58      try {
59        CompressionTest.testCompression(Compression.Algorithm.LZO);
60        fail(); // always throws
61      } catch (IOException e) {
62        // there should be NO cause because it's a direct exception not wrapped
63        assertNull(e.getCause());
64      }
65  
66      assertFalse(CompressionTest.testCompression("LZO"));
67      assertTrue(CompressionTest.testCompression("NONE"));
68      assertTrue(CompressionTest.testCompression("GZ"));
69  
70      if (NativeCodeLoader.isNativeCodeLoaded()) {
71        nativeCodecTest("LZO", "lzo2", "com.hadoop.compression.lzo.LzoCodec");
72        nativeCodecTest("LZ4", null, "org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.Lz4Codec");
73        nativeCodecTest("SNAPPY", "snappy", "org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec");
74      } else {
75        // Hadoop nativelib is not available
76        LOG.debug("Native code not loaded");
77        assertFalse(CompressionTest.testCompression("LZO"));
78        assertFalse(CompressionTest.testCompression("LZ4"));
79        assertFalse(CompressionTest.testCompression("SNAPPY"));
80      }
81    }
82  
83    private boolean isCompressionAvailable(String codecClassName) {
84      try {
85        Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().loadClass(codecClassName);
86        return true;
87      } catch (Exception ex) {
88        return false;
89      }
90    }
91  
92    /**
93     * Verify CompressionTest.testCompression() on a native codec.
94     */
95    private void nativeCodecTest(String codecName, String libName, String codecClassName) {
96      if (isCompressionAvailable(codecClassName)) {
97        try {
98          if (libName != null) {
99            System.loadLibrary(libName);
100         }
101 
102         try {
103             Configuration conf = new Configuration();
104             CompressionCodec codec = (CompressionCodec)
105               ReflectionUtils.newInstance(conf.getClassByName(codecClassName), conf);
106 
107             DataOutputBuffer compressedDataBuffer = new DataOutputBuffer();
108             CompressionOutputStream deflateFilter = codec.createOutputStream(compressedDataBuffer);
109 
110             byte[] data = new byte[1024];
111             DataOutputStream deflateOut = new DataOutputStream(new BufferedOutputStream(deflateFilter));
112             deflateOut.write(data, 0, data.length);
113             deflateOut.flush();
114             deflateFilter.finish();
115 
116             // Codec class, codec nativelib and Hadoop nativelib with codec JNIs are present
117             assertTrue(CompressionTest.testCompression(codecName));
118         } catch (UnsatisfiedLinkError e) {
119           // Hadoop nativelib does not have codec JNIs.
120           // cannot assert the codec here because the current logic of
121           // CompressionTest checks only classloading, not the codec
122           // usage.
123           LOG.debug("No JNI for codec '" + codecName + "' " + e.getMessage());
124         } catch (Exception e) {
125           LOG.error(codecName, e);
126         }
127       } catch (UnsatisfiedLinkError e) {
128         // nativelib is not available
129         LOG.debug("Native lib not available: " + codecName);
130         assertFalse(CompressionTest.testCompression(codecName));
131       }
132     } else {
133       // Compression Codec class is not available
134       LOG.debug("Codec class not available: " + codecName);
135       assertFalse(CompressionTest.testCompression(codecName));
136     }
137   }
138 
139 
140   @org.junit.Rule
141   public org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ResourceCheckerJUnitRule cu =
142     new org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ResourceCheckerJUnitRule();
143 }
